  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">sharks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haifische</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">requins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tubarões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">squali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καρχαρίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiburones</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The student is asked to read a story about a shark and then answer questions and do the activities in the powerpoint presentation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sharks</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kursteilnehmer wird gebeten, eine Geschichte 
über einen Haifisch zu lesen und dann Fragen zu beantworten und die 
Aktivitäten in der powerpoint Darstellung zu tun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étudiant est invité à lire une histoire au 
sujet d'un requin et puis à répondre à des questions et à faire 
les activités dans la présentation de powerpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estudante é pedido para ler uma história sobre
um tubarão e então para responder a perguntas e fazer as atividades 
na apresentação do powerpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo è chiesto di leggere una storia circa 
uno squalo ed allora di rispondere alle domande e fare le attività 
nella presentazione del powerpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπουδαστής καλείται να διαβάσει μια ιστορία για 
έναν καρχαρία και έπειτα τις ερωτήσεις απάντησης και να κάνει 
τις δραστηριότητες στην παρουσίαση powerpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piden el estudiante leer una historia sobre un 
tiburón y entonces contestar a preguntas y hacer las actividades en 
la presentación del powerpoint.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
